about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am Camila Palacios, a certified Ontological Coach with over 5 years of experience helping people reach their full potential.
about.description2: My approach focuses on facilitating personal and professional transformation processes, guiding my clients towards a more fulfilling and meaningful life.

what.title: What is Ontological Coaching?
what.description: It is a transformational learning process that allows you to observe and modify your way of being and being in the world.

who.title: Who is it for?
who.description: For anyone seeking personal growth, professional development, or improving their relationships.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.description: Greater self-awareness, better communication, leadership development, and personal transformation.

sessions.title: Individual Sessions
sessions.description: 60-minute personalized sessions, available both online and in-person, tailored to your specific needs.

programs.title: Specialized Programs
programs.description: Structured programs for leadership development, emotional management, and personal transformation.

differentiators.title: What makes me different?
items: Holistic approach integrating mind, body, and emotion
